title: A proclamacion set forth by the state and bodie of the Kynges Maiestes Counsayle now assembled at London, conteinyng the very trouth of the Duke of Somersets euel gouernment, and false and detestable procedinges
author: England and Wales. Privy Council.
notes: Imperfect; a fragment of one leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
